Articles.Content:
Greetings.

I am Adam, a 16-year-old from Britain.

I've owned KSP since December 2012, but never really got involved in the community. Now that I've just finished school, I should have a lot more time on my hands, which is why I'm here.

I have a few hobbies, which in increasing order of eccentricity are: Gaming (mainly Minecraft and KSP), Programming, YouTube (YouTubing?), and Micronationalism (Just google it).

-H.I.M. Adamus Primus Imperator
Well then, welcome aboard! It's always nice to have an international flair on the forums.
